translations.en: <:draftbot:529305485963427840> **Hello and welcome to DraftBot!** 👑 The king is looking for a noble knight to marry his daughter and you have chosen to participate in the selection contest! Having just arrived at the castle entrance after a long journey, you signal your presence to the guards at the entrance. You are invited to enter and quickly meet a young woman who seems to want to welcome you.

translations.fr: La jeune femme se pr√©sente et encha√Æne rapidement sur des premiers conseils que vous √©coutez avec attention, vous apprenez que la commande {command:report} vous permet d'obtenir toutes les informations √† propos de votre voyage.
translations.en: The young woman introduces herself and quickly follows up with some initial advice which you listen to carefully, you learn that the command 'report' allows you to get all the information about your trip.

translations.fr: Vous admirez les immenses murailles du ch√¢teau. Apr√®s quelques instants, la jeune femme arrive finalement √† votre hauteur et vous transmet quelques conseils. Vous apprenez notamment que la commande {command:report} vous permet d'obtenir toutes les informations √† propos de votre voyage.
translations.en: You admire the immense walls of the castle. After a while, the young woman finally reaches you and gives you some advice. You learn that the command 'report' allows you to get all the information about your journey.

translations.fr: Vous restez sans r√©agir √† l'invitation du garde. Apr√®s quelques instants, la jeune femme arrive finalement √† votre hauteur et vous transmet quelques conseils. Vous apprenez notamment que la commande {command:report} vous permet d'obtenir toutes les informations √† propos de votre voyage.
translations.en: You remain unresponsive to the guard's invitation. After a while, the young woman finally reaches you and gives you some advice. You learn that the command 'report' allows you to get all the information about your journey.
